description: This file defines a class DefaultFirebaseOptions providing method for getting platform-specific Firebase configuration options, serving as a placeholder for actual credentials in a Flutter project.

classes.name: DefaultFirebaseOptions
classes.description: A class that provides platform-specific Firebase options with a static method to retrieve them. Currently returns placeholder values.

methods.name: currentPlatform
methods.description: A static getter that returns FirebaseOptions with placeholder values, intended to be replaced with generated credentials for each platform.
